text: Pope video: cut the script by about 800 words using Grok, simplified lots of the names and complex details that don't really matter and make the video longer and more confusing. Made it flow nicer and shortened the intro, also started to properly map out "the killer" section. Solid day of work!
Pope Video: continued work on 'the making of a killer' section almost done now (it's one of the longer sections) still need to film some aroll + broll but will batch do that. `
Working Tuesday night: Shot some broll of the crime board (shot of pope, mehmet and grey wolves)
